title: WHY ME RIOT? WHY?
body:
Hi i'm really not in a good mood right now as 2 of my accounts have been muted, it's only 10 days but i dont deserve them, The amount of times i've reported a racist is a nightmare. Riot really doesnt even give a **** about us (me atleast) and decides to mute me for the most stupid shit. Legit people are toxic all the time and i'll admit i have my moments but people say stuff way worse than me. Some players use the "N" word, Other Racial Slurs and Sexism in offensive ways and do not get muted. The only time i would usually curse is when someone is Intentionally Feeding. Cursing is acceptable to a certain degree and I should not be muted.

 Look Riot I'm not a racist like others. I'm not intentionally trying to be rude/toxic or feed but you have legit no idea of how your game works. Its OCE, legit the most toxic server and the people who start trouble in games usually never get muted. You can't just mute a toxic player they don't stop. There will always be more until you do something. Stop favouring NA and fix your real problems. It's called a Tribunal if you weren't "Buffing" and "Nerfing" the wrong champions you could actually do something that could help this toxic community.

Riot you're killing the game. Fix it. Now.

Rectal,

replies.body:
Ok dude, I took a look at your chat log from the game that got you chat restricted. It is so bad I don't even want to post it here.

Looking at what the other players said, NOTHING they said even comes close to as bad as what you said.

Straight up, if you don't want to be banned you need to take this restriction seriously and stop this sort of behaviour.

The only way you could possibly believe that you don't deserve this ban is if you've let someone else on your account. If that's the case I suggest you reset your password.

Your red text on your name doesnt intimidate me. Someone must've been on my account I don't know who though never told anyone my email or password.

When this mess is over wanna duo Queue?

Obv troll is obv.

I've locked the account. The original owner can retrieve it through an account recovery ticket.

> The amount of times i've reported a racist is a nightmare.

-1

How is this relevant? Like, at all?

> Cursing is acceptable to a certain degree and I should not be muted.

You're not wrong, but there's a clear difference between something like "f\*ck me" and something like "f*ck you you stupid feeder b!tch". Targeted slurs/curses are not acceptable, no exceptions.

> I'm not intentionally trying to be rude/toxic or feed but you have legit no idea of how your game works.

Or you just have no idea that you're being a d!ck and don't properly understand that certain behaviours are simply unacceptable. I tend to think the latter is true (as it usually is in these kinds of situations).

> You can't just mute a toxic player they don't stop.

If you've found a bug with the mute feature where it doesn't actually stop an individuals comments from appearing when you mute them, then you should submit a support ticket to inform Riot of it so they can fix it. Here's a link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

> It's called a Tribunal if you weren't "Buffing" and "Nerfing" the wrong champions you could actually do something that could help this toxic community.

Sounds like you don't understand that the people responsible for balance don't handle the player behaviour issues (and vice versa).

Hahaha well me and Riot Gehirn will be having some rectal punishment times after our little duo ;)
